+- document[]
   +- comment[]
   +- rootElement[]
   +- rootElement[]
      +- text[@Image = "\n    "]
      +- comment[]
      +- text[@Image = "\n    "]
      +- child1[@test = "1"]
      |  +- text[@Image = "entity: Copyright: PMD\n    "]
      +- text[@Image = "\n    "]
      +- child2[]
      |  +- text[@Image = "\n        "]
      |  +- cdata-section[@Image = " cdata section "]
      |  +- text[@Image = "\n    "]
      +- text[@Image = "\n"]
